page.title: 12PARKER MOTORS,DITTON PRIORS.
page.content: The garage was built in 1948 on the site of a pond.It is 36 feet by 36 feet in size . The garage employs five people working in the paint shop, fore court, scrap yard,{car repair {shop}and office.The garage provides petrol,{diesel,}oil, spare parts for cars and confectionary. The garage supplies many other services like breakdown trucks,taxis for school and private use. They sell 200 to 500 gallons of { {petrol}a day, one gallon of petrol in {1985 costs Â£2.00.}There has just been a new 5,500 gallon petrol tank installed. { }The major event of the year is when the {R.A.C.Lombard Rally }comes through the village and many competitors stop at the garage for repairs and petrol.
